 47: 


 48: 


 49: 


 50: """


 51: 


 52: 


 53: __kernel void vertical_convolution(


 54:     const __global float * input,


 55:     __global float * output,


 56:     __constant float * filter __attribute__((max_constant_size(MAX_CONST_SIZE))),


 57:     int FILTER_SIZE,


 58:     int IMAGE_W,


 59:     int IMAGE_H


 60: )


 61: {


 62: 


 63:     int gid1 = (int) get_global_id(1);


 64:     int gid0 = (int) get_global_id(0);


 65: 


 66: 


 67:     if (gid1 < IMAGE_H && gid0 < IMAGE_W) {


 68: 


 69:         int HALF_FILTER_SIZE = (FILTER_SIZE % 2 == 1 ? (FILTER_SIZE)/2 : (FILTER_SIZE+1)/2);


 70: 


 71: //        int pos = gid0 * IMAGE_W + gid1;


 72:         int pos = gid1 * IMAGE_W + gid0;


 73:         int fIndex = 0;


 74:         float sum = 0.0f;


 75:         int r = 0,newpos=0;


 76:         int debug=0;


 77: 


 78:         for (r = -HALF_FILTER_SIZE ; r < FILTER_SIZE-HALF_FILTER_SIZE ; r++) {


 79:             newpos = pos + r * (IMAGE_W);


 80: 


 81:             if (gid1+r < 0) {


 82:                 newpos = gid0 -(r+1)*IMAGE_W - gid1*IMAGE_W;


 83:                 //debug=1;


 84:             }


 85:             else if (gid1+r > IMAGE_H -1) {


 86:                 newpos= (IMAGE_H-1)*IMAGE_W + gid0 + (IMAGE_H - r)*IMAGE_W - gid1*IMAGE_W;


 87:             }


 88:             sum += input[ newpos ] * filter[ fIndex   ];


 89:             fIndex += 1;


 90: 


 91:         }


 92:         output[pos]=sum;


 93:         if (debug == 1) output[pos]=0;


 94:     }


 95: }


 96: """
